title: Ignota's SCP-6664 Pixel Fanart
content:

++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7091103310974881066?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en Process Video] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6664 SCP-6664]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** 6664.mp4, 6664.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** hhttps://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7091103310974881066?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6664 by Rhineriver
[[/<]]
-----

I like the format of this article! I think the "confused about which one's the actual anomaly" is a fun concept and I like the execution. 

The art on this one has a lot more "realistic" colors than I normally do just because I wanted to make it look kinda natural. Granted, they're definitely not... REAL colors... but... you know, lol. 

I also really like DChance's whole speech near the end. First line kinda made me chortle. 

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
